system:

deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xmlEV_TEXTABLE_I
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
feature -- Access
f_text../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_texttext: FalseSTRING_32 -- Text displayed in label. deferred ensure not_void: Result /= Void cloned: Result /= ../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_texttext end
feature -- Element change
f_set_text../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_set_textset_text (a_text: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Assign a_text to ../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_texttext. require a_text_not_void: a_text /= Void no_carriage_returns: not a_text.Falsehas_code (('%R').Falsenatural_32_code) deferred ensure text_cloned: attached a_text as l_text and then ../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_texttext.Falsesame_string_general (l_text) and then ../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_texttext /= l_text end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_textable.xmlEV_TEXTABLE note option: stable attribute end
